name: dave md
description: A WhatsApp bot based on Baileysjs library (Ts+Js) with Multi Device support

BOT_PREFIX.description: Put your bot prefix of desire here

AUTO_STATUS.description: Type true if you want bot to view status else false

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session ID here(should start with dave~)

addons.description: Free PostgreSQL database for storing bot data.

buildpacks.description: Node.js runtime for running the bot.
